website_summaries.verdict: Stylish looking case that has a bit of sparkle, while protecting the phone with 3 layers.
pros: Uses a raised lip around the screen and around the front camera to protect those areas from scratches
More than half a dozen colors and styles of cases available
Doesn't add bulk to the phone
Uses an outer, inner, and central layer to provide maximum protection for the phone
Good price for a phone case
cons: Doesn't provide a heavy level of protection, especially against drops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of sparkle
customer_reviews.text: The red is exactly as pictured and is a true red. Perfect for bringing Christmas cheer! The case was very easy to snap on to my phone. I have no problem plugging the charge cord in which is a plus. The case makes my phone easier to hold but isn't tacky feeling. I would recommend this case to anyone wanting some glitter or sparkle in their life while protecting their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Philhart

customer_reviews.title: face down and not a scratch!
customer_reviews.text: ok I didn't like this case cause it's bulky. At least compared to other cases I've had. The glitter looks great in the sunlight. Fits my 8 plus perfectly. I never drop my phone but for some reason I have dropped this one twice in the past couple of weeks. Once even in a parking lot. Both landed face down....NOT A SCRATCH ON IT! woohoo! So that earns this case 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mraff

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much that when I purchased my silver ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before (the rose gold version) for my rose gold iPhone 7 Plus. I loved it so much that when I purchased my silver iPhone 8 Plus there was no question on whether I would purchase the silver case. UPDATE: My phone was recently stolen. I repurchased the silver case for my iPhone 8 Plus because I loved it so much. As I previously mentioned, the product is durable and long lasting. It was a no brained to purchase it again for my replacement phone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case, much prettier than the photos online
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case, much prettier than the photos online. I am used to an Otterbox, so it was a big step for me to change. I'm sure it doesn't have the same level of protection, but for the price I feel that it is a good option. It has a grip to it, but isn't sticky. It is not slick, so I won't worry about it falling out of my hands. The sides are well covered. Very happy with my purchase! And, as a plus...it actually fits the 6plus, and the camera works.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clair

customer_reviews.title: SPARKLY✨
customer_reviews.text: So Pretty and sparkly! The cool thing is all the sparkly parts are under the outer case so there isn’t any texture to it but nice grip to it. I haven’t dropped it yet but it looks like it will protect all the edges. The1 thing I don’t like is how difficult it was to get on, I like to change the cases depending on what I will be doing, water/sand vacation etc....not looking forward to removing and putting it back on. Overall great case!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Hound

customer_reviews.title: This case is amazing! I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing! I absolutely love it! It came all in one piece and fits my iPhone 8 Plus perfectly. It is so sparkly and pretty that the picture doesn't do it justice! The rose gold pink is so pretty, true to the picture color. I am going to order a gold one now and maybe a red one too! Actually, I think any color you order would look nice! It also has a very good feel to it, not slippery at all. It has a little bit of a raised lip on the front so I think it would protect my phone if it is dropped. The camera on the back is totally protected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I’m guilty of buying way too many cases and this one is now my favorite. Perfect level of slim while still making me feel that there is a good amount of protection and perfect texture to make me feel like I have a good grip. The glitter is on the inside so it won’t chip off or scratch other things in my purse. Will definitely get other colors.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best iPhone case I have ever owned (and I've had a lot of them). Easy on, easy off. Works with the new wireless charging pad (for my iPhone 8+) without any problems. Very smooth but has the look of a lot of glitter and sparkle. I've received many complements on it. The black/silver ombre color is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cumbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Red Sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this phone case for my I-phone 8+! Perfect fit, covers the edges of the phone well. All side buttons when used have no problem with connection. I feel that if I dropped the phone I would have the protection you want for accidental drops. The red sparkle is even prettier in person than on-line. Will be making more purchases from this seller for the different colors they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Red and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: So lovely and sparkly......like Dorothy's Ruby Slippers! Gets lots of notice in the most positive way!
customer_reviews.author: Grace L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: 👍 great product! & So cute
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! , both the price and product. It’s cute and shines even more in the light/sun, everyone compliments it🙂 bought two colors and I don’t regret it at all. I got oink & gold but literally want all color bc this is 👍 I have a gold iPhone and it fits it so goooood the color looks exactly like my phones camera lineing
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price & it’s a pretty case. Fits my iPhone 8plus perfectly as it should
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest phone case i’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. I got the silver glitter case for my white/silver iPhone 8Plus. I was worried it would look cheap and childish but it’s very simple and pretty. Although the case protects the back and corners of the phone, if you do not have a screen protector, don’t expect this case to save your screen from shattering.
customer_reviews.author: El.N

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed when I got this case
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed when I got this case. It is nothing at all like it is described. It is not a 3 layer protective case but is nothing more then a soft jelly case with a layer of card board. Too it all off it also looks nothing like the picture very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: worthington

customer_reviews.title: Even prettier than on the Amazon screen!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and is even more beautiful! I was afraid it would be dull but it's it's not! It's rubber but not a pliable material. I love that I can charge my phone with the case on and can report that it works as well with a wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: molly c

customer_reviews.title: Feels a Bit Loose
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the color! The red sparkles and it feels sexy and chic. Very easy to clean, and to hold - feels firm withouth being bulky. Fits easily in my pockets. Durability = 4 stars simply because I haven't had the item long enough to test it. The case went on easily, however, there seems to bit a slight bit of wiggle room - not enough for the case to come up, but noticeable to the feel. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love how sparkly it is in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Love how sparkly it is in the sun. I have dropped my phone a couple of times with no damage BUT I did purchase a Mr. shield for the I phone. That kept the screen from cracking. But I love the sparkles on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Diane V

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this case. I get a lot of compliments on it. It matches with all of my cutest outfits and is understated yet fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful! No problems
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! No problems. It fits well, but not too tight. However, there is no protection for the front at all. So if you are rough on phones, be sure to get a tempered class cover.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Super cute AND protected the heck out of my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t leave reviews, but i bought this phone cas about a month or two ago and had an unfortunate accident... my phone ha did fallen out of my pocket and was found in the middle of the road and run over a bunch of times. When I had recovered it, my phone screen was cracked, but my case was perfectly in tact. And when I got it fixed and had to take my case off, and the back was completely damage free. I’m so in awe. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: the glitter is just paper
customer_reviews.text: Very deceitful. there is a clear rubber layer, then a "layer" of PAPER, then the harder layer that is closest to the phone does not even completely cover the sides of the phone. super cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my gold iPhone 7 Plus and its just as pretty as I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to go on my gold iPhone 7 Plus and its just as pretty as I was hoping! I can’t speak to its ability to protect my phone from any harm, as I haven’t dropped it yet, but at least it looks nice. It’s a slim case, not bulky like some.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. This is literally the 5th case I bought!!! I have given away as gifts all the colors gold, gray, ombre, and 2 pink ones. The pink and gray are the prettiest ones!:) they protect the phone really well and look awesome the only thing i wish i had is a discount after buying the second one lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright red metallic case, openings and buttons line up beautifully. A bit concerned about the minimal amount of overlap around the phone but so far case fits tightly around phone. We’ll see how it protects phone when (ugh) phone is dropped. Definitely not an Otter case but gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: LGGA

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for a red cover, and this one has the glitter that makes it just a little different than most!! Not too bulky, easy to remove and put back on. I've only had it on a couple of day, so I can't tell you I've gotten it dirty, but it would certainly be easy to clean. Easy to hold, although I also have an iRing on it so I can hold it and put it down on the table and still read it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I love the case. I was looking for a case in red to match the phone. I had purchased one like this before and when I got my new phone I knew I wanted the same case but different color. It is a true red and has just enough sparkle, but not too much that it blinds you. I fits well over the phone and the rubber around the edges is flexible, so if you drop your phone the case will take the impact and protect your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Fits well, and is pretty. Most of the non-propriety plugs fit, but if in an emergency if they don’t, you can easily lift an edge to insert a plug. At first, I was concerned that I might drop my new iPhone 8+, but the silicone covering really helps. I haven’t dropped it. It’s rolled off the bed, still ok. Added a popsocket for added security.
customer_reviews.author: Quackerone

customer_reviews.title: Very good durable case
customer_reviews.text: Have had the case for a couple of weeks now it works great, doesn’t take up a lot of space and actually pretty good at being durable. Has fallen a couple of times and my screen protector has cracked but no damage to the case as of now. Highly recommend if you’re wanting to get a cute case but afraid to have around children.
customer_reviews.author: msosa17

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and VERY sparkly!!! Thought it would be a little thicker but its pretty thin. Also, the case is a clear case with a piece of sparkly paper inside of it. But so far it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case, very comfortable feel in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I love sparkly cases, and this one is awesome! Lots of sparkle without being over the top or tacky. It’s lightweight , but yet it offers great protection for my new iPhone 8 Plus. I had a similar case on my old 6 Plus, so I decided to try the black ombré color this time. It compliments my white and silver iPhone nicely. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: PhxVegas

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Doesn’t easily scratch. Easy to hold & it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This case is everything I have ever wanted. It sparkles way way more than I thought it would. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea helm

customer_reviews.title: I just got a new Iphone and love this case 1 improvement this should have have cut ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new Iphone and love this case 1 improvement this should have have cut out where the Apple symbol is shown, from that the case is very pretty and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jewel g

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this phone case! it looks even better in person, and fits comfortable in my hands. it also fits the phone extremely well! it is very vibrant and beautiful and i would highly recommend this case to anyone who just loves glitter
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rodes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & durable (nearly 2yrs so far!)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case since October 2017, and it’s been great! It’s been dropped too many times to count and my phone is still perfect. As shown in product pics, there are several pieces, and I have the pink, which is a pink silicone/rubber outer layer, covering a thin silver glitter paper, and then an interior clear shell. Over time, the outer pink has changed color a bit from being in the sun, being held so frequently, etc., but it’s still a pretty pink. I love this case a lot!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie f

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty💞
customer_reviews.text: I really love that it’s lightweight, not bulky, but the edges should cover more!!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Persian Kitten3

customer_reviews.title: Supports Wireless Charging
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing to me was that I have the ability to use my wireless charger with the case. I had a wonderful case that was too thick for the charger, and the price for this one was ideal. My iPhone 8 Plus easily charges through the case, and I'm very happy with its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: I. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, flexible yet sturdy, not your typical "thin" gel case, easy to use side buttons, beautiful color, front edge raised just enough to protect screen but not be "lumpy". Wish they had more colors!
customer_reviews.author: S. Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: I also love the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly! It comes over the front to keep the screen protected if it falls screen first. I also love the way it looks, I just wish it was not see through at all. I can still see a little of the Apple icon on the back.
customer_reviews.author: kodie09

customer_reviews.title: Protective and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this case! I normally buy the large Otterbox, but moving to an iPhone 8 Plus, I wanted something that protected my phone when I had my clumsy moments and still fit in my pocket. This seems to do both. I’ve dropped my phone a couple of times and it’s held up well. Wish there was more of a lip or edging providing more screen protection, but for the price, I can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly, it comfortable to hold and really reminds you how thin and sleek the iPhone 8 plus is after having it in a bulkier case for so long. The fit is great and all the holes line up. It's hard to tell from the pictures, but there is a slight raised lip around the camera lens that raises it when laid flat on a surface, which is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Returned Product
customer_reviews.text: The case isn’t built to protect the phone’s screen. The edges of the case is not risen, so if phone is placed face down, the screen scratches with the surface. The rising part is to also protect your phone if it falls. It is a cute phone , but i was looking for a good protective case that was cute.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Good case but the case bezel isn’t big enough around the screen. The phone almost lays on the screen. I dropped my phone and a small portion of the screen edge cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this case on my phone for 2 days now. I love the way it looks and feels. I have the iphone 8 plus silver. The case fits perfectly and from what I can tell protects the phone pretty well. If you're looking for a case that isn't bulky, stylish, and semi-protective like I was, this is the case! The case came in a nice package and it didn't take long to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanna McClain

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case with low expectations since it was pretty cheap, but when I got it I was very pleased. It’s a very pretty pink glitter, slick/smooth to the touch and is not very bulky on the sides like my previous phone case was. I also really like that it’s not opaque so you can hardly see the big black magnet I have on the back of my phone for my car mount. I’m very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine F.

customer_reviews.title: Ruby Red Cover for Iphone 8 plus.
customer_reviews.text: Such a gorgeous red color. Reminds me of Dorothy’s ruby red shoes from Wizard of Oz. Fits great on my iPhone 8 plus. I cannot vouch for the durability with a fall since I'm keeping my phone safe...for now. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. L. Quibod

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I wanted something I could add a Christmas sticker to but also be able to take it off and use it for the New Year as well. Finish is smooth as the glitter “paper” is under the silicone-ish case. Received so many compliments on this case.
customer_reviews.author: Breerbear

customer_reviews.title: So sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and couldn’t wait to review it because it is so pretty. I just put it on my iPhone...easy! I don’t know how it will hold up yet. If I can remember to do so, I’ll update after I’ve had it awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case! It’s super sparkly and shimmers nicely in ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case! It’s super sparkly and shimmers nicely in the sunlight. The glitter is protected, no fall out at all, and the case itself is not bulky. I’ve dropped my phone (waist height) a few times and it has provided enough protection.
customer_reviews.author: christopher urista

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case and a pack of the recommended screen protectors with 3 in a pack. I had this phone less than 2 months when I had to put on the 3rd screen protector. I very seldom drop my phone and it is never on a hard surface like cement. The case had such a good rating, I am shocked it is so bad. Thank goodness, my phone is ok and all of the cracks on the screen were on the protector itself.
customer_reviews.author: ShayBrou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case for the price! Lots of compliments and super sparkly. Smooth so can be a tad slippery but excellent quality. I’ll b ordering another in a diff color.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Update on phone case
customer_reviews.text: This product looks very cute upon receiving it. I have used the product for a over three months now. The case has began to come apart. It has never had any form of water damage. However it does have some small little spots within it. I made a mistake and dropped my 7plus and it still had a small scratch on the upper right corner. The case will not hold up pass 6 months with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Leading Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: This case lasted me a year. I drop my phone pretty constantly and it has been kept in great shape because of this case. Gonna buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca L. Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. It offers just the right amount of protection. It’s cute and not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love pink and a nice durable case, this one fits exactly what I was looking for. It’s even more beautiful in person and seem very protective. Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sparkly case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful case. It seems durable (I’ve had it a week) and is lovely to look at. My sister in law dropped my phone by accident, and it landed on its face. I held my breath as I lifted it off of the floor. I was pleasantly surprised to see that my phone was fine! I would recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and covers the entire back and all four sides
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and covers the entire back and all four sides! Also leaves enough room for a bulky charger which I don't find much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It was very durable and protective and not heavy, however the color was bright red and it is pictured as more maroon
customer_reviews.author: mallory

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!!! Smooth surface and yet it doesn’t slide or slip off of surfaces or out of my hands. This is one of the nicest phone cases I’ve purchased in a long time. The price is unbelievable, but much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Buying this case every time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Had it 2 years and still looks great & protects my phone! Changed to Lifeproof case & less than 2 months the back of my iphone shattered. I will never buy another case again, I trust this case to do it’s job and look amazing while doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: It fits the IPhone 8 Plus just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this protective for my wife's new IPhone 8 Plus. She likes it but says that it is a bit slipper to hang on to.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Its so pretty up close
customer_reviews.text: Freaking loves it, Its so pretty up close. The sparkle is amazing, I totally recomend it. I bought two, that's how much I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle's Honest Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this case so much! It is just the right amount of cute without looking unprofessional at business meetings. It protects my phone well - I have dropped it numerous times with zero damage. Easy to clean and take on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs and did a fine job. Nice feel.
customer_reviews.text: It’s still on my 8+. Has done fine. A few minor slips on my part, but nothing happened to phone. Knock on wood. Everyone comments that they think it so pretty 💕 and sparkly. Pop socket works nicely too. I just ordered the similar vers. For my 11Pro. 🙋🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE COVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone cover!! It has already saved my phone a couple times I have dropped it or one of my kids has dropped it! Excellent quality!! :) would buy again for sure! Very pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Meier

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case. I ordered the gold and it is super sparkly and a good quality case. Feels sturdy but not super bulky on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: Fits my IPhone 8+ and seems to be of good quality and should hold up to protect my new ...
customer_reviews.text: So flipping cute! Fits my IPhone 8+ and seems to be of good quality and should hold up to protect my new phone. Not bulky so phone fits in places without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The pink looks great on my rose gold iPhone 8 Plus and fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this case! The pink looks great on my rose gold iPhone 8 Plus and fits perfectly. Easy to put on and take off, yet snug enough to stay on. Haven’t dropped my phone with it on, but expecting it to work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This case is beautiful! I absolutely love all of the sparkles. I had this case for my iPhone 6s and when I upgraded my phone I had to get another one for my new phone. It holds up well and protects your phone when you drop it.
customer_reviews.author: JMI

customer_reviews.title: I love my two new cases for my new red iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my two new cases for my new red iPhone 8 Plus! Have always bought expensive cases for my phones but saw these and loved them! Very inexpensive but high quality and looks and feels like an expensive case! Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple case
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Just arrived and was a lot prettier than I anticipated. I am not big on sparkles but I thought that I would get a case that was somewhat fun but not too overbearing. It's just right. Fits well on my phone and is also very sleek without it being too, "in your face" style. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and I bought three more of different color
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Noce
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Bought for Christmas and have got compliments all month long! Lightweight and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Color is very vivid and glitter is bright
customer_reviews.text: I had my daughter order this for me because no one has time to do this kind of thing. She thought I would like the bright color and I do. I didn't give 5 stars because it's just a normal cell phone case, but that's what I expected. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa damron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this red phone case to use at Christmas. I was going to buy a pop socket to use with it but it is too pretty to cover any part of it. It is very sparkly and a vibrant red. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah West

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and good quality. I’m going to get another in red!
customer_reviews.author: TammyW

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: like that it has 3 layers, feels very protected and very sparkly!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Cute case and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute case and great for the price. The only critique is that the "sparkle" isn't actually a part of the case material, it is actually just a piece a paper that lines the case from the inside. It is a thicker piece a paper so it will probably be okay, I was just expecting it to be just a part of the case material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Is more pink than rose gold but pink is my fav color so I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Arm candi

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this case! It’s beautiful, fits my phone perfectly, and feels great in my hands! The side buttons as well as the side control for silencing my phone are easily accessed and the sparkle is gorgeous!! I wish I could afford to buy one in every color! Awesome product, will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi32

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: My case discolored unexpectedly and ESR contacted me and shipped me a brand new case free of charge! I’ve never had this type of customer service on Amazon! They’re great. I’ll continue to be a customer! Plus the case is beautiful. I’ve received plenty of compliments. Thank you ESR!
customer_reviews.author: JaeHaana

customer_reviews.title: Fits my phone awkwardly
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought the red one and it fit my phone perfect! I then decided to buy the dark one (silver to black ombré) and it doesn’t fit my phone properly... it’s almost impossible to put my headphones in because the case fits a little too small. I’m a bit disappointed that the cases aren’t made consistent in size. Probably won’t be using it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Loera

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute, but not very durable became it's very thin.
customer_reviews.author: bolorerdene

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped my phone 10+ times already, not a scratch on it. I have had this on for a couple months now. Works very well, light weight and my favorite, it's very sparkly! I constantly get complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my Iphone 8plus
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews I read about this case said it didn't fit their phones very well, but I found no trouble in putting it onto my phone. Have had so many compliments on the glittery look of the case! I am very satisfied with this case--good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Blagsvedt

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought my daughter one
customer_reviews.text: I is a gorgeous case and it appears to protect well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the sparkles!
customer_reviews.text: My case just arrived and I LOVE it! The color is vibrant and the glitter looks so neat in the sun. My daughter says my phone matches Dorothy's sparkly shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayLou81

customer_reviews.title: Pretty... but too thin
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cover case but its too thin. I wish this item was a bit thicker so protects the lhobe better.
customer_reviews.author: Ari7Cely7

customer_reviews.title: Red is Pink. I Hate Pink.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new iPhone 8 Plus in RED. So it’s unfortunate that I ordered a matching ombré RED case but, plot twist: IT IS PINK. I’m sad :( I hate pink.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieMooo

customer_reviews.title: I change my cover often and your great styles and colors make it fun to do so
customer_reviews.text: I change my cover often and your great styles and colors make it fun to do so, let alone the prices!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: I am a case-a-holic. Bought this for Christmas and can use it for Valentines also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! The sparkles are completely enclosed under a durable-feeling plastic/rubber coating, so you don’t get sparkles on everything you touch. I haven’t dropped my phone yet, but it feels very protective. For the money, girl, get it. Just get it. You won’t be disappointed for the low price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think I was expecting it to be a tad more padded than it actually is, but I love it!! I've only had it a few days and have had so many compliments on it......even from total strangers at the store!! Would absolutely purchase it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Gena Poole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case - I have gotten many compliments already
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case - I have gotten many compliments already, and the glitter is incredibly sparkly! Fits securely and has comfortable feel. If you have any questions or issues, the customer service is excellent and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Q.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: This case works great and protects my phone very well
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case and protective
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case and protective. Very happy with my purchase. I debated for quite a while since I’m a faithful otter box/lifeproof user but I love this case!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Davis

customer_reviews.title: Super sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPhone 8 Plus just fine. I get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Rates

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give it 4 stars and not 5 is because when I hold it with a pop socket, the pop socket sometimes peels off. This is because the case has a few layers.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: so good. I love the feel of the case
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I love the feel of the case, it has a good grip. I love the color of the the case, true red.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry N Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty case!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty case!! It also has the raised edge in the front to protect the screen. Fits my phone nicely. I would purchase more feom this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Missy P.!!

product_meta.title: ESR iPhone 8 Plus Case, iPhone 7 Plus Case,Glitter Sparkle Bling Case [Three Layer] for Girls Women [Supports Wireless Charging] for Apple 5.5" iPhone 8 Plus/7 Plus(Red)
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone 7 Plus 5.5 Inches and 2017 edition.
“Bling Bling” Style: Solid color with sparkles makes you and your phone look glamorous
3-Layer design: Soft TPU edge makes installation easy. An eye-catching sparkle color make-up layer makes a statement. A PC layer protects your iPhone from drops, shocks, and scratches.
Premium Protection: 3-layer design protects your iPhone drops, shocks, and scratches while a front raised lip protects the screen.
Ultra-Thin & Lightweight: Just 7.92mm thinness and 26g weight to keep the original beauty of your iPhone and give you excellent grip.
